00013 namespace tpk {

00029    class Filter2D {
00030       public:
00031          Filter2D(
00032             xycoord xy = xycoord(0.0, 0.0)   
00033          ) : Value(xy) {};
00034          Filter2D(
00035             const Filter2D& src
00036          ) {
00037             src.Mutex.lock();
00038             Value = src.Value;
00039             src.Mutex.unlock();
00040          }
00041 
00043          virtual Filter2D* clone() const {
00044             return new Filter2D(*this);
00045          };
00046          virtual ~Filter2D() {};
00047 
00049 
00054          virtual xycoord operator<<(
00055             xycoord input               
00056          ) {
00057             Mutex.lock();
00058             Value = input;
00059             Mutex.unlock();
00060             return input;
00061          };
00062 
00064 
00069          virtual xycoord value() const {
00070             Mutex.lock();
00071             xycoord v = Value;
00072             Mutex.unlock();
00073             return v;
00074          };
00075 
00077          virtual void reset( 
00078             xycoord xy = xycoord(0.0,0.0)    
00079          ) {
00080             Mutex.lock();
00081             Value = xy;
00082             Mutex.unlock();
00083          };
00084 
00085       protected:
00086          xycoord Value;             
00087          mutable TcsMutex Mutex;    
00088    };
00089 }
